# Import the needed libraries and set the current working directory:
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(knitr)

setwd('C:/Users/cy_su/PycharmProjects/DSCI_605_Data_Visualizations/Module 2/M2_Lab1/')
```


# Read the data
```{r}
crop.data <- read_csv("Crop_Range_GOES0901_R (1).csv")
crop.data
```


# Select necessary columns
```{r}
crop.data.col <- crop.data %>%
  select(year, jday, gmt, frp, BinTime)
crop.data.col
```


# Filter the data where jday > 227
```{r}
crop.data.col.filter <- crop.data.col %>%
  filter(jday > 227)
crop.data.col.filter
```

# Group data based on Bintime and summarize the average of frp
```{r}
crop.data.col.filter.grouped <- crop.data.col.filter %>%
  group_by(BinTime) %>%
  summarise(avg_frp = mean(frp, na.rm = TRUE))
crop.data.col.filter.grouped
```

# View the final cleaned data
```{r}
final_crop_data <- crop.data.col.filter.grouped
print(final_crop_data)
```
